payload.title: EventBus Unit Tests - 20 EARS Tests Complete
payload.description: Implement comprehensive EARS unit tests for EventBus covering core functionality (EARS-1 to EARS-8), advanced features (EARS-9 to EARS-16), and helper functions (EARS-17 to EARS-20). Include type safety tests, error handling, performance scenarios, and subscription management.
payload.notes: 20 EARS unit tests implemented covering: EventBus instance creation, event publishing with validation, subscription management with unique IDs, multiple subscribers, unsubscribe functionality, wildcard subscriptions, async handler support, high-throughput scenarios, type safety for all GitGov events, and helper functions.
